p: Chest pain: This symptom is present in intubated-ICU patients (5.5%), non-intubated-ICU patients (8.3%), non-ICU patients (3.4%), and healthy subjects (1.9%). Chest pain is increased in all 3 patient groups compared to healthy subjects but is significant only in the non-intubated group (p < 0.01) and is very mild compared to all symptoms in all patient groups. This symptom is higher in non-intubated-ICU patients compared to other patients (p < 0.01).
